body: Art is pretty nice and all but this NTR, genre in general, is starting to look formulaic, always the same pattern of victory for douche and boyfriend with small dick. Seriously, you don't even need to read part 4 and you can pretty much have a good sense for what's going to come.

Lol, this same story is told sooo many times, it's crazy. The NTR genre to hentai is like the Isekai genre to anime/light novels. Same shit. Different name. FMC has a crush. Big dude in faculty (almost always a coach) dicks her down and blackmails her. She wants to resist but her body responds to it.  The sensei ends up being everywhere she goes and have all types of public sex. MC is clueless the entire way. MC and FMC finally have sex for the first time and they always hug up each other missionary style. His dick is too little and he cums way too quick . She's like "Eh? Already?" Sensei calls her up and she willingly goes. Shit's hilarious but it's so played out.
Sigh... This is so shitty, the art is ok but the characters and story are so incredibly dumb. What a downgrade from the past, when characters and stories had to be good.
